text: We are currently in the middle of the desert in Saudi Arabia setting up an aeroponic tower farm in a greenhouse. With our aeroponic towers we can grow food in the most extreme climates where temperatures can reach 125 degrees Fahrenheit. We can save 95% water in comparison to conventional farming allowing us to grow food in the harshest desert conditions where water is so scarce. This is truly the embodiment of redefining the food supply chain in countries where most of everything is imported.
